getVMID

public java.rmi.dgc.VMID getVMID()
Gets the VMID associated with this virtual machine. The VMID is created once by the classloader and is cached.

Returns:
The unique VMID.

book

public boolean book(java.lang.String recId,
                    java.lang.String maxOccupancy,
                    java.lang.String customerId)
             throws RecordNotFoundException,
                    ValidationException
Description copied from interface: DatabaseClient
Books a room. Validates the availability of record id is available, max occupancy and customer id is valid and the room is not already booked. Also date checks are made for a valid booking to take place.

Specified by:
book in interface DatabaseClient
Parameters:
recId - The record id against which to make the booking. This is the logical record positoin.
maxOccupancy - The maximum occupancy of the booking. This number should not exceed the room capacity. No further calculations are made or saved.
customerId - The customer id against whom the booking is made. This is stored in the database and signifies that the room has been booked.
Returns:
true if the booking was successful.
Throws:
ValidationException - If a record is not bookable.
RecordNotFoundException - If a record was not found. This can happen when an admin deletes a record while another client is in the process of making the booking.
